SEARCH

Class Finder

java.lang.Object
Finder
public class Finder extends Object
This class represents a finder that finds data in a 2D array.

  • Method Details

    • findColumnIndex

      public int findColumnIndex(String[][] data, String columnName)
      Finds the index of a column in a 2D array based on the column name.
      Parameters:
      data - the 2D array containing the data
      columnName - the name of the column to find
      Returns:
      the index of the column, or -1 if the column is not found

    • getColumnValues

      public String[] getColumnValues(String[][] data, int columnIndex)
      Gets the values of a column in a 2D array based on the column index.
      Parameters:
      data - the 2D array containing the data
      columnIndex - the index of the column to get the values from
      Returns:
      a String array containing the values of the column

    • findUserInputInTheNewColumn

      public boolean findUserInputInTheNewColumn(String[] info, String[] columns, int inputType)
      Checks if a user's input is found in a new column.
      Parameters:
      info - the user's input
      columns - the new column
      inputType - the type of the user's input
      Returns:
      true if the user's input is found in the new column, false otherwise

    • findDataInColumn

      public String[] findDataInColumn(String dataToFind, String[] columnData)
      Finds data in a column and returns the row index and the data.
      Parameters:
      dataToFind - the data to find
      columnData - the column to search in
      Returns:
      a String array containing the row index and the data

    • rowFinder

      public String[] rowFinder(String[][] data, String[] rowIndex0and)
      Finds a row in a 2D array based on the row index and returns the contents of the row.
      Parameters:
      data - the 2D array containing the data
      rowIndex0and - a String array containing the row index
      Returns:
      a String array containing the contents of the row

    • valueFinderInRow

      public String[] valueFinderInRow(String infoRequested, String[] rowToCheckIn, String[][] data)
      Finds a value in a row based on the requested information and returns the value.
      Parameters:
      infoRequested - the requested information
      rowToCheckIn - the row to check in
      data - the 2D array containing the data
      Returns:
      a String array containing the value
